pages.text: At a great distance from the battlefield, rangers still have one of the biggest influence in the grand battle. Their ranged weapons deal a big amount of damage and their projectiles are completely unpredictable for a fighting warrior.

pages.title: Passive Abilities
pages.text: $(li) +20% Projectile damage: Any projectile damage done gains 1.2 x ProjectileDamage = NewProjectileDamage. $(li) +10% Movement speed: Any movement, walking, running or sneaking gets a 1.1 x MovementSpeed = NewMovementSpeed. This is stacked with other speed change attributes such as speed potions.
$(li) +35% Damage taken: Any damage from the these $(l:other/damage_taken)damage sources$() gets the following calculation 1.35 x DamageIncome = NewDamageIncome.
